name: vibecode-party-starter
description: A Next.js starter template for vibecoding SaaS apps
author: John Polacek

scripts.dev:db: open -a Docker && sleep 5 && pnpm db:start && next dev --turbopack
scripts.boot:github: brew install gh && gh auth login
scripts.boot: pnpm boot:github && pnpm boot:vercel && pnpm boot:repo
scripts.go: pnpm generate:routes && git add . && aicommits && git push origin main
scripts.db:ensure-docker: docker info > /dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'üê≥ Starting Docker...' && open -a Docker && sleep 10)
scripts.db:restart: pnpm db:ensure-docker && pnpm db:stop && pnpm db:kill-ports && docker ps -aq --filter name=supabase | xargs -r docker rm -f && docker network ls --filter name=supabase --format '{{.Name}}' | xargs -r docker network rm && docker ps -aq --filter name=postgres | xargs -r docker rm -f && pnpm db:start && pnpm db:reset:local
scripts.db:restart:clean: pnpm db:stop && pnpm db:kill-ports && docker system prune -f --volumes --filter label=com.docker.compose.project=supabase && docker network prune -f && pnpm db:ensure-docker && pnpm db:start && pnpm db:reset:local
scripts.db:lint:local: pnpm db:get-url | xargs supabase db lint --db-url
scripts.db:push:local: pnpm db:get-url | xargs -I {} supabase db push --db-url={} --include-all
scripts.db:push:prod: dotenv -e .env.production -- bash -c 'backup_file="backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql" && mkdir -p backups && echo "üîÑ Creating backup..." && supabase link --project-ref "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF" --password "$SUPABASE_DB_PASSWORD" && supabase db dump --linked -f "backups/$backup_file" && supabase unlink && echo "‚úÖ Backup saved to backups/$backup_file" && echo "‚ö†Ô∏è Pushing changes to production..." && supabase link --project-ref "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF" --password "$SUPABASE_DB_PASSWORD" && supabase db push --include-all && supabase unlink'
scripts.ship: pnpm lint && pnpm build && (pnpm dev & sleep 10 && pnpm test && kill $!) && pnpm db:push:prod && pnpm go
scripts.db:deploy: echo 'üö® Remember to backup first!' && npm run db:diff && echo '‚ö†Ô∏è Review the diff above. Continue? (ctrl+c to cancel)' && read && npm run db:push && npm run db:unlink
scripts.db:backup: dotenv -- bash -c 'backup_file="backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql" && echo "üîÑ Creating backup..." && supabase link --project-ref "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF" --password "$SUPABASE_DB_PASSWORD" && supabase db dump --linked -f "backups/$backup_file" && supabase unlink && echo "‚úÖ Backup saved to backups/$backup_file"'
scripts.db:restore: dotenv -- bash -c 'echo "‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING: This will overwrite the current database with a backup file" && echo "Enter the backup file name from the backups directory (e.g. backup_20240402_123456.sql):" && read backup_file && echo "Are you sure you want to restore from backups/$backup_file? This cannot be undone! (y/N)" && read confirm && [[ $confirm == "y" ]] && supabase link --project-ref $SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF --password $SUPABASE_DB_PASSWORD && psql "postgresql://postgres:$SUPABASE_DB_PASSWORD@db.$SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF.supabase.co:5432/postgres" -f "backups/$backup_file" && supabase unlink && echo "‚úÖ Database restored from $backup_file"'
scripts.db:admin: supabase status | grep 'Studio URL' | awk '{print $3}' | xargs open
scripts.test:setup: pnpm db:stop && pnpm db:start && pnpm db:reset:local
scripts.db:clean: docker ps -aq --filter name=supabase | xargs -r docker rm -f && docker network ls --filter name=supabase --format '{{.Name}}' | xargs -r docker network rm && docker ps -aq --filter name=postgres | xargs -r docker rm -f
scripts.db:switch: pnpm db:stop && pnpm db:clean && pnpm db:start && pnpm db:reset:local
